root: ^A weirdly shaped key lies still on the grass.

seenBox1: ^It looks about the size of the hole in the front of that steel crate.
^Maybe this is what you need to open it all along.
notSeenBox1: ^The function of a key is to open things.
^You wonder what lock does this key open.

c-0: ^You pick up the key and put it in your inventory.
c-1: ^You leave this key behind for someone else to pick it up.
